EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-02-01
EmailTemplate.subject: AI Is Not the End of Software Developers and 7 Recent Books That Everyone in Tech Should Read
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FEBRUARY 1, 2018 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/ai-is-not-the-end-of-software-developers-28d80df3c331?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> AI Is Not the End of Software Developers A data scientist’s take on Software 2.0. The Future of Software <[[https://builttoadapt.io/ai-is-not-the-end-of-software-developers-28d80df3c331?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/7-recent-books-that-everyone-in-tech-should-read-626acf0d759e?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> 7 Recent Books That Everyone in Tech Should Read Necessary reads on the past, present, and future of the tech industry. Check it Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/7-recent-books-that-everyone-in-tech-should-read-626acf0d759e?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/you-deserve-a-continuously-integrated-platform-here-s-why-it-matters?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> You Deserve a Continuously Integrated Platform Richard Seroter breaks down the Master Pipeline, a continuous integration platform that tests every new Ops Manager, tile, and add-ons release together on the three main public IaaS providers. Why It Matters <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/you-deserve-a-continuously-integrated-platform-here-s-why-it-matters?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[http://shortyawards.com/10th/that-moment]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-developer-catnip-episode-ep-57?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Developer Catnip Episode (Ep. 57) In this episode of Pivotal Insights, Josh Long joins Jeff and Dormain to discuss trends in software development in the enterprise (such as the emergence of reactive programming), preview the upcoming Spring release, share some insights from his latest book, and explain why he decided to put a Blue-eared Kingfisher on the cover. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-developer-catnip-episode-ep-57?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/net-or-java-for-microsoft-and-its-new-partners-its-not-either-but-both-e8894c842445?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> .NET or Java — For Microsoft and its New Partners, it’s not Either, but Both Jason De Lorme, Global Partner Business Evangelist at Microsoft, breaks down the company's growing collaboration with the Java community and open source. Watch Now <[[https://builttoadapt.io/net-or-java-for-microsoft-and-its-new-partners-its-not-either-but-both-e8894c842445?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/graph-processing-on-greenplum-database-using-apache-madlib?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Graph Processing on Greenplum Database using Apache MADlib How Greenplum and databases like it effectively solve practical graph processing problems at scale. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/graph-processing-on-greenplum-database-using-apache-madlib?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/st%C3%A9phane-nicoll-and-madhura-bhave?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Digital Transformation at Charles Schwab Learn about Charles Schwab's journey to deliver solutions faster and more efficiently through building agile practices and cloud ready applications. On Migrating the Cloud <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/tech-modernization-a-cloud-migration-henri-van-den-bulk-john-berry?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter&utm_content=1517437021]]> Upcoming Events 2/7 Cloud-Native Workshop, Milan <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Cloud-Native_Milan_070218.html]]>
3/13-3/14 Spring Days, Boston <[[https://springdays.io/2018/boston]]>
4/17-4/20 Greenplum Summit at PostgresConf US, Jersey City <[[http://greenplumsummit.io/]]>
4/18-4/20 Cloud Foundry Summit North America, Boston <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2018/]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
